name: TRATEL64 Supporter's Resource Bundle
detailed_description:
Be able to see the experience from a new angle, the TRATEL64 Supporter's Resource Bundle gives you everything that came from Tratel64 of any value. That means Character Models, the 64 Track OST, Extremely old builds of the game, and much more!

WHAT YOU GET


Character Models - All the Character models from the game! Source files provided for you to have fun with, for any purpose you so desire!

Original Soundtrack - Enjoy some bopping tunes from the 64 track OST!

Game Script - The script for the entire game is revealed, available to read! Take a look at all the possibly cut content!

Extremely Old Builds - Nothing much to note, they're old builds from early in the development of this game.

Concept Art - Concept Art.
